knimeNode.name: Maximum Finder
knimeNode.shortDescription: Processes given images and locates local maxima within them. The analysis of maxima can be done in any dimensionality and including channels.

intro.p: Processes given images and locates local maxima within them. The analysis of maxima can be done in any dimensionality and including channels.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Choose whether or not to use a noise tolerance. If set a toleance of your choosing is included in the computation.
Choose whether or not to use a suppression of found maxima.If set each maxima will be a local one within the set radius. If supression is set to 0, nothing will be done.
